name: sashimi-ui
description: UI library which brings out the best of the ingredients(HTML)

scripts.build: npm run clean&&npm run build:react&&npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: cp -r src/css dist/css&&npm run build:css:bundle&&npm run build:css:suibundle
scripts.build:css:bundle: ls src/css/*.css | grep -v .theme.css | xargs cat | postcss --config config/default > dist/css/bundle.css
scripts.build:css:suibundle: ls src/css/*.css | grep -v .theme.css | xargs cat | postcss --config config/sui-prefixed > dist/css/sui-bundle.css
